name: Doomsday Drop
description:
(Left and Right arrow keys to rotate, don't let the button get pressed!)

Oh, would you look at that. Some idiot supervillain wannabe dropped their Doomsday Device down a pit. How careless of him.

Good news, though! YOU are the Doomsday Device! And you would really like to not blow up.

How long does the world have to live? That's for you to decide! Good luuuuuck!

Made in 3 days for ScoreJam #22

This is both my first game jam and my first game. I've been thinking of getting into game dev for a while now, but haven't had the motivation. So, naturally, the first thing I did was join a game jam. (wtf was i thinking)

explosion sfx by derplayer

clank sfx by EminYILDIRIM

explosion particles was a tutorial I followed by Cloudy Water Games
